content.description:
4-Star movement with 1-Star rock quality. The FA can be seen at 2:56 in this video:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j8T__o5fJZI

. The hold Kehl starts on broke, but the sit start from the blob below still goes, as can be seen at 2:59 here:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SbclCEW6k_E

. It is about V10 post-break.

After the break, many have been starting standing from the right facing sidepull and are taking V7 for it.
Squat start on pockets. Move up slab into undercling, grab decent holds over the lip to a tricky mantle
content.location: The mine cart boulder on the back wall facin the river. It's the center face.

content.description: SDS on sloping rail, reach up for small finger undercling. Right hand on side pull to big jugs. Easy mantle.
content.location:
Mine Cart Boulder

Starts right of "Surfs Up"

Down climb north west corner.

content.description: Something to do if you're hanging out here and already did all of the variations on Kill By Numbers. Bunchy and smeary start for tall folks. Continue up arete and top out to the right.
content.location: Arete on the boulder directly behind Kill By Numbers. SDS right hand on perpetually sandy edge and left on low crimp.

content.description: Stand start on crimps. Climb up face on flakes to an easy mantle.
content.location: The mine cart boulder on the wall facing down stream. It's right up the middle of face

content.description: Stand start on low crimps. A couple hard lock offs lead to good holds and an easy mantle.
content.location: Take trail on left past "kill by numbers" and you will see it. It's the obvious streaked wall you see from the road.

content.description: Stand start on left arête. Climb up arête to an easy mantle.
content.location: The mine cart boulder on the back wall facing river. Left arête.

content.description: Stand start. Nice slab with pockets.
content.location: From Kill by Numbers, continue up the trail (down-canyon) past Streaked, up into the small canyon.

content.description: An easier and lower quality version of Kill By Numbers. SDS on east side of the Kill By Numbers boulder. Traverse the lip to eventually gain the top out of Kill By Numbers.
content.location: East side of Kill By Numbers boulder

content.description: Squat start in cave on right facing jug. Throw right hand to flat edge, left to incut edge. Right hand slaps along lip, left to crimp. Grab jugs over lip to a easy mantle
content.location: The first boulder you encounter on trail 200' up road on right from the mine cart boulder.

content.description: Stand start on right arête. Climb up arête to an easy mantle.
content.location: The mine cart boulder on the back wall facing the river. It is the right arête.

content.description:
4-Star movement with 1-Star rock quality. The FA of the original line can be seen at 2:56 in this video:

youtube.com/watch?v=j8T__o5…

. The hold Kehl starts on broke, but a sit start sequence was unlocked, which can be seen at 2:59 here:

youtube.com/watch?v=SbclCEW…

.

After the break, many have been starting standing from the right facing sidepull and are taking V7 for it.
